hadiths.text: Narrated Ubai bin Ka`b:I asked Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) about a man who engages in sexual intercourse with his wife but does not discharge. He replied, "He should wash the parts which comes in contact with the private parts of the woman, perform ablution and then pray." (Abu `Abdullah said, "Taking a bath is safer and is the last order)

chapter.ara-name: باب غَسْلِ مَا يُصِيبُ مِنْ فَرْجِ الْمَرْأَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Washing away what comes out from the private parts of a woman (woman's discharge) if one gets soiled with that
